ActualOutput.description: Indicates the currently active output in percent

ActualType.title: ControllerTypeEnumeration
ActualType.description: Actual value for the controller type used by the zone

ActualValueActive.description: Indicates the current status of the controller

AutomaticReferenceZoneSelection.description: If true, the HRD selects automatically the reference zone.

AverageControllerOutput.description: Indicates the average output which can be used when a sensor is broken

LowerOutput.description: Limitation of the minimum output in closed-loop control in %

OutputTime.description: Time basis for operating the actuator

ReferenceZone.description: If zones are to operate parallel to a control zone, the reference relation can be realised with this parameter.

SetValueActive.description: A control zone is switched on and off with this parameter.

SetValueManualOutput.description: Manually given output in percent if SetValueType = MANUAL is selected

SetValueType.description: Set value for the controller type used by the zone

UpperOutput.description: Limitation of the maximum output in closed-loop control in %

UpperSetValueCascade.description: If the two controllers are cascaded, the master defines to which nominal temperature value the slave is to control to. With this parameter, the upper limit for the slave is defined.

EvenHeatUpEnabled.description: Enables even heat-up process until nominal SetValue of Temperature of ZoneType is reached

ManualOutputLimitActive.description: Activates heat-up process with pre-defined SetValueManualOutputLimit until SetValueTemperature is reached

RelayHeatingGroup.description: Number of the heating group for relay heating

RelayHeatingTime.description: Time for relay heating of the zone. When RelayHeatingTime of all zones of a heating group have expired, the next group starts heating.

SetValueManualOutputLimit.description: This pre-defined maximum output (in percent) is valid until the SetValueTemperature is reached.

SetValueTemperature.description: If ManualOutputLimitActive is set, SetValueManualOutputLimit is active until this nominal temperature value is reached.

data.description: This pre-defined maximum output (in percent) is valid until the SetValueTemperature is reached.
If ManualOutputLimitActive is set, SetValueManualOutputLimit is active until this nominal temperature value is reached.

DisplayLanguage.description: Setting of desired language on the user interface at the HRD

IdentifyDevice.description: The peripheral device on which this method is called shows itself by e.g. activation of a LED.

ResetAllErrors.description: Method to reset all errors of the device

ResetErrorById.description: Method to reset one error of the device

SetReactionOnDisconnect.description: Method to set ReactionOnDisconnect and SessionNameForReactionOnDisconnect

NOT_DUE.description: Maintenance of the device/component is not due

DUE.description: Maintenance of the device/component is due
